snippet.title: Doom III Launch Trailer (a Doom II Mod)
snippet.description:
Doom III is a mod for Doom II.
It runs on the GzDoom engine, and if you own the new Doom + Doom II on steam you can use it's Doom2.Wad to run this mod with GzDoom.
both GzDoom as well as the Doom III mod can be downloaded for free.

Updated version 1.0b available: https://www.moddb.com/mods/doom-3-doom-ii-mod/downloads/doom-iii-doom-ii-mod-v10b
The two first skill levels gives more ammo than before, and the Lite version is a good bit smaller.

Released on Doom II's 30th Anniversary.

Great thanks to the entire Doom Modding Community, this Mod would not have been possible without you.

Doom III Website: https://camaxide.wixsite.com/doom3
ModDB for Download: https://www.moddb.com/mods/doom-3-doom-ii-mod
D3 Discord: https://discord.gg/chfWWbJgHb

Thanks to Thomas Silver for making the trailer:  @thomassilver2529
